titleInfo.title: Rick Riman tapes - tape 1 of 5 - Side one - Channel one

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Bluegrass performances collected by Rick Riman. On loan from Craig S. Wales. Includes session takes and live personal appearance recordings. Country Boys; Billy Ray (banjo) - Clarence White (guitar) - Roland White ? (mandolin) - Leroy Mack (dobro) - Roger Bush (bass) - Bob Sloan ? (fiddle). Appearing with Bill and Charlie Monroe is Bobby Hicks and Vassar Clements on fiddle. Bill Monroe's Bluegrass Boys at Oak Leaf Park listed as Bobby Smith - Tony Ellison - Billy Baker - Bessie Lee Mauldin - others. Audio restricted. Contact for access.
